metadata.name: The Vision
metadata.description:
The Vision: a quote from Banksy's book 'Wall and Piece', that we believe inspired his piece 'Never Boring', framed against the wall of The Never Boring House,  1 Barrack Road, Great Yarmouth, UK.

The Vision will give you access to The Be Never Boring House project as a VISITOR, with the chance to participate in The Mission, and a place on the allowlist to mint a BLANK KEY.

The Vision is of Meme of Production.

attributes.value: Be Never Boring (with words by Banksy)
